titleStmt.title: The only deliverer from wrath to come, or, The way to escape the horrible and eternal burnings of Hell By Thomas Vincent.
titleStmt.author: Vincent, Thomas, 1634-1678.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for George Calvert, and Samuel Sprint, and are to be sold at the Golden Ball ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, Unversity of California, Los Angeles.
